languages.text: "После разведывательной операции в системе Тинаурус данная единица была повышена до звания логиса и переведена на Футфол для выполнения функций, соответствующих актуальному статусу". {n}В безэмоциональном голосе техножреца слышится нечто, схожее с тоской.{/n}

"After a reconnaissance mission in the Tinaurus System, this unit was promoted to the rank of Logis and transferred to Footfall in order to perform the functions appropriate for its current status." {n}There is something close to wistfulness in Opticon-22's otherwise emotionless voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: "После разведывательной операции в системе Тинаурус данная единица была повышена до звания логиса и переведена на Футфол для выполнения функций, соответствующих актуальному статусу". {n}В безэмоциональном голосе техножреца слышится нечто, схожее с тоской.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "After a reconnaissance mission in the Tinaurus system, this unit was promoted to the rank of logis and transferred to Footfall so it may perform functions appropriate for its current status." {n}There is something to Opticon-22's emotionless voice that's akin to wistfulness.{/n}

"After a reconnaissance mission in the Tinaurus system, this unit was promoted to the rank of logis and transferred to Footfall so it may perform functions appropriate for its current status." {n}There is something to Opticon-22's emotionless voice that's akin to wistfulness.{/n}

"After a reconnaissance mission in the Tinaurus System, this unit was promoted to the rank of Logis and transferred to Footfall in order to perform the functions appropriate for its current status." {n}There is something close to wistfulness in Opticon-22's otherwise emotionless voice.{/n}

"After a reconnaissance mission in the Tinaurus System, this unit was promoted to the rank of Logis and transferred to Footfall in order to perform the functions appropriate for its current status." {n}There is something close to wistfulness in Opticon-22's otherwise emotionless voice.{/n}

"After a reconnaissance mission in the Tinaurus System, this unit was promoted to the rank of Logis and transferred to Footfall in order to perform the functions appropriate for its current status." {n}There is something close to wistfulness in Opticon-22's otherwise emotionless voice.{/n}

languages.text: 「ティナウルス星系での偵察任務後、本ユニットは論理学者の階級に昇格し、現在の役割にふさわしい機能を実施するためにフットフォールに移管されました」{n}オプティコン-22の無感情な声には、切なさに近いものがある。{/n}
languages.original_text: "After a reconnaissance mission in the Tinaurus System, this unit was promoted to the rank of Logis and transferred to Footfall in order to perform the functions appropriate for its current status." {n}There is something close to wistfulness in Opticon-22's otherwise emotionless voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ティナウルス星系での偵察任務後、本ユニットは論理学者の階級に昇格し、現在の役割にふさわしい機能を実施するためにフットフォールに移管されました」{n}オプティコン-22の無感情な声には、切なさに近いものがある。{/n}

languages.text: “在提诺斯星系完成侦察任务后，本单位被提升为逻辑士之列，并转移到落脚港，以执行适合其当前状态的功能。”{n}奥普蒂孔22号冰冷的声音中包含着某种近乎惆怅的情绪。{/n}
languages.original_text: "After a reconnaissance mission in the Tinaurus System, this unit was promoted to the rank of Logis and transferred to Footfall in order to perform the functions appropriate for its current status." {n}There is something close to wistfulness in Opticon-22's otherwise emotionless voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “在提诺斯星系完成侦察任务后，本单位被提升为逻辑士之列，并转移到落脚港，以执行适合其当前状态的功能。”{n}奥普蒂孔22号冰冷的声音中包含着某种近乎惆怅的情绪。{/n}

languages.text: «Tras una misión de reconocimiento en el sistema Tinaurus, esta unidad fue ascendida al rango de Logis y transferida a Paso para desempeñar las funciones propias de su jerarquía actual». {n}La voz impasible de Opticon-22 transmite cierto atisbo de nostalgia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "After a reconnaissance mission in the Tinaurus System, this unit was promoted to the rank of Logis and transferred to Footfall in order to perform the functions appropriate for its current status." {n}There is something close to wistfulness in Opticon-22's otherwise emotionless voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tras una misión de reconocimiento en el sistema Tinaurus, esta unidad fue ascendida al rango de Logis y transferida a Paso para desempeñar las funciones propias de su jerarquía actual». {n}La voz impasible de Opticon-22 transmite cierto atisbo de nostalgia.{/n}

languages.text: « Après une mission de reconnaissance dans le système de Tinaurus, cette unité a été promue au grade de Logis et transférée à Castel pour y remplir les fonctions relatives à son statut actuel. » {n}Vous décelez comme un soupçon de mélancolie dans la voix autrement impassible d'Opticon-22.{/n}
languages.original_text: "After a reconnaissance mission in the Tinaurus System, this unit was promoted to the rank of Logis and transferred to Footfall in order to perform the functions appropriate for its current status." {n}There is something close to wistfulness in Opticon-22's otherwise emotionless voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Après une mission de reconnaissance dans le système de Tinaurus, cette unité a été promue au grade de Logis et transférée à Castel pour y remplir les fonctions relatives à son statut actuel. » {n}Vous décelez comme un soupçon de mélancolie dans la voix autrement impassible d'Opticon-22.{/n}

languages.text: "Nach einer Aufklärungsmission im Tinaurus-System wurde diese Einheit in den Rang Logis befördert und nach Footfall versetzt, um dort ihrem aktuellen Status angemessene Funktionen zu erfüllen." {n}In die ansonsten emotionslose Stimme von Opticon-22 schleicht sich fast so etwas wie Wehmut ein.{/n}
languages.original_text: "After a reconnaissance mission in the Tinaurus System, this unit was promoted to the rank of Logis and transferred to Footfall in order to perform the functions appropriate for its current status." {n}There is something close to wistfulness in Opticon-22's otherwise emotionless voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nach einer Aufklärungsmission im Tinaurus-System wurde diese Einheit in den Rang Logis befördert und nach Footfall versetzt, um dort ihrem aktuellen Status angemessene Funktionen zu erfüllen." {n}In die ansonsten emotionslose Stimme von Opticon-22 schleicht sich fast so etwas wie Wehmut ein.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu birim, Tinaurus Sistemi'ndeki keşif görevinin ardından Logis kademesine yükseltilmiş ve mevcut mevkisine uygun görevleri yerine getirmek üzere Binliman'a nakledilmiştir." {n}Opticon-22'nin normalde duygudan yoksun ses tonunda hasrete yakın bir tını mevcut.{/n}
languages.original_text: "After a reconnaissance mission in the Tinaurus System, this unit was promoted to the rank of Logis and transferred to Footfall in order to perform the functions appropriate for its current status." {n}There is something close to wistfulness in Opticon-22's otherwise emotionless voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Tinaurus Sistemi'ndeki keşif görevinden sonra bu birim Logis kademesine yükseldi ve mevcut mevkisine uygun görevleri yerine getirmek için Binliman'a transfer edildi." {n}Opticon-22'nin normalde duygusuz olan ses tonunda efkarlı bir tını hissediyorsun.{/n}
